ironymon:

Some actually want to know if the file is damaged before they download it.

The real question is: Why do you want to keep this information from them?

are the only one REGULARLY putting out Grossly Pixelated encodes.

AVIGUY

Well it seems that You have done a very detailed job in looking into all of the files which those groups upload, and that raises a question:
Are you really doing it for the rest of the users? or just because You are a detractor of those groups with hidden interests? do You have a better source? then post link, upload it and stop making long irrelevant comments without giving any proper solution. Thank You very much ; )

@Tiroloco

I love you.  That is what I've been trying to say to other people like MP4SUX.  And I DL DIMENSION all the time, and he's never used MP4 for GRIMM or any other show I DL... only MKV.
